Title: Relates to designating a portion of the state highway system as "Specialist Gerald B. Penn Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system in the town of Boston, county of Erie, as the "Specialist Gerald B. Penn Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as "Specialist Gerald B. Penn Memorial Bridge"
